[Manhua]
(Blades of the Guardians)
8/10 		just really fun, found myself forced to read the next chapter because it was just so entertaining and everything felt pretty new to me (maybe i just havent read enough manhua). only issue is updates are really slow and translations are even slower so i had to do it myself and im stupid so im not very good at it <--- jk it was too hard.
[Manhua]
(Feng Shen Ji)
8.2/10 		the first manhua ive read thats actually good amongst manga standards. differs from the normal shounen and the artwork is straight up beautiful.

[Manga]
(Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway)
1/10 		just read the title. what the fuck. i saw a review of this on mal and they said Whore => trash? this guy is stupid. he might have missed the memo but a highschooler and an almost 30 year old is not just weird but also illegal in most places. maybe its just a japan vs western culture difference but this is why i never want to go to japan. no image
[Manga]
(Your Lie In April)
9.5/10 		this was genuinely one of the most beautiful manga and just things ive ever read and easily in my top 10 manga of all time. its crazy that i put off reading it for so long because i didnt like the cover. read it if you havent already and read it even if you have.

[Manga]
(My Dress-Up Darling)
5.3/10 		this is 50% fanservice 50% something else and im not even sure what the something else is but its not good at either. if i wanted porn id watch porn. this is definitely not a 9 as it somehow got on comick but the recent arc has unironically been really great (like an 8). unfortunately thats because it is so different from the rest of the manga (the latest arc being the one where she cosplays as kmart griffith).
